thread.title: No piercings, no tattoos for daughter: Mulligan
thread.title_full: No piercings, no tattoos for daughter: Mulligan - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: No piercings, no tattoos for daughter: Mulligan
text:
Actress Carey Mulligan, who gave birth to her first baby with husband Marcus Mumford earlier this month, shared that as a life lesson, she would not like her daughter to have any tattoo or piercing
READ : Carey Mulligan names baby daughter Evelyn
The Suffragette actress, who gave birth to her first child, Evelyn, will advise her not to make modifications to her body, or hide her natural beauty with cosmetics, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
"Oh, man, one life lesson? No make-up, no piercings, no tattoos," New York Daily News newspaper Quote: d the 30-year-old as saying.
Mulligan-starrer Suffragette , which released on October 12, is a British historical period drama film directed by Sarah Gavron, which revolved around early members of the British women's suffrage movement of the late 19th and early 20th century.
The film also features actors Helena Bonham Carter, Meryl Streep, Ben Whishaw, Brendan Gleeson and Anne-Marie Duff.
